scripts.docker:dev: docker compose down -v && yarn sleep5s && docker compose up -d dev-db && yarn sleep5s && yarn mgrt && yarn sleep5s && yarn seed
scripts.docker:setup: docker compose down -v && yarn sleep5s && docker compose up -d db && yarn sleep5s && docker compose up -d laravelapp && yarn sleep5s && docker exec laravelapp php artisan migrate && yarn sleep5s && docker exec laravelapp php artisan db:seed
